mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: ChangeIt enables secure, fast, and transparent international family support transfers through a trusted settlement network. We connect families worldwide by facilitating reliable financial support transfers.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To become the most trusted global platform for family support transfers, ensuring security, compliance, and transparency in every transaction.

kyc.title: Know Your Customer (KYC)
kyc.content: We implement comprehensive KYC procedures to verify the identity of all users and ensure compliance with international regulations.

aml.title: Anti-Money Laundering (AML)
aml.content: Our AML monitoring systems continuously analyze transactions to detect and prevent suspicious activities.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content: We use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your personal and financial information.

regulatory.title: Regulatory Compliance
regulatory.content: ChangeIt operates in full compliance with applicable international financial regulations and maintains relationships with licensed local business partners.

monthlyPlans.title: Monthly Support Plans
monthlyPlans.subtitle: Automated Recurring Transfers
monthlyPlans.description: Set up a monthly support plan to ensure your family receives consistent financial support without manual intervention.

info.title: Get in Touch
info.description: For inquiries about our services, support, or compliance matters, please reach out through the form below.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: ChangeIt is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect information necessary to provide our services, including identity verification data, transaction information, and contact details.

dataUse.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUse.content: Your data is used solely for providing our services, compliance purposes, and improving our platform. We do not sell your personal information.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement industry-standard security measures including encryption, secure servers, and access controls to protect your information.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. Contact us to exercise these rights.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.introduction: By using ChangeIt, you agree to these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully.

serviceDescription.title: Service Description
serviceDescription.content: ChangeIt provides international family support transfer services through a licensed settlement network.

userObligations.title: User Obligations
userObligations.content: Users must provide accurate information, comply with all applicable laws, and use the service only for legitimate purposes.

fees.title: Fees
fees.content: Our fee structure is transparent and disclosed before each transaction. Fees vary based on transfer amount.

liability.title: Liability
liability.content: ChangeIt operates within the bounds of applicable regulations. We are not liable for delays caused by third-party partners or regulatory requirements.
